name: Linga Bhairavi Guru Purnima Pooja
description:
Learn Bhakthi Sadhana this Guru Purnima to deepen your spiritual sadhana.
Celebrate Guru Purnima in the powerful presence of Linga Bhairavi Yantra.
ADDRESS
• 49 Midway Dr, Mckees Rocks, 15136
TIME
 • 5:00pm-8:00pm, Sunday July 21st, 2024
CONTACT
 • Grace Zhao, 412-862-5007 (Whatsapp or Message)

SCHEDULE
• 5:00pm-5:50pm: Bhakthi Sadhana Class (Age 14+)
• 5:50pm-6pm: Ye Devi Music, Be Seated
• 6:00pm-7:00pm: Linga Bhairavi Arathi, Lum Vum Music, Devi Stuthi Chanting, Linga Bhairavi Arathi
• 7:00pm-8:00pm: Light meal with Fruit and Salad will be provided.

WHAT TO BRING?
• You are not required to bring anything, however, you are welcome to offer flower or sweets to the Linga Bhairavi yantra.
guidelines: Due to the nature of the event, a light stomach conditionin is recommended. There should be a gap of 1.5 hours from the last full meal. As a general note, always consult and follow your doctor's advice. If you have any questions regarding your participation, please contact us.
prerequisites: For Bhakthi Sadhana Class, anyone above 14 years of age can attend. No previous experience of yoga required. For the rest of the event, all are welcome.One can choose to participate in the entire event or only the Bhakthi Sadhana Class or only the Linga Bhairavi Pooja.
